## Cycle Through Powerups [mkwcat, TCAtrevor]

Press Minus (-) in-game to cycle through all powerup states.

This code is for New Super Mario Bros. Wii. Many revisions may be untested.

<details>
<summary>PAL Rev 1</summary>

```hex
C2145560 00000008
A01E0EA8 540004E7
41A2002C 809E14E0
38840001 2C040007
41800008 38800000
7FC3F378 3D808014
618C5C00 7D8903A6
4E800421 80010014
60000000 00000000
```
</details>
